Lua.Comment(Not used by RSL): For lua the preprocessor section is used for namespaces rather than doing nothing with it.

PreprocessorValues.Name: rfg
PreprocessorValues.Description: Contains all game specific types and functions.

PreprocessorValues.Name: rsl
PreprocessorValues.Description: Used for rsl types and helper functions.

Identifiers.Name: Player
Identifiers.Description: Type containing all the variables which represent a player. To get the actual player instance use rfg.ActivePlayer.

Identifiers.Name: ActivePlayer
Identifiers.Description: The current player instance. Automatically located by RSL for convenience.

Identifiers.Name: HideHud
Identifiers.Description:
Sets the visibility of the hud.

Args:
bool Hide: Whether or not to hide the hud. Pass true to hide it and false to make it visible.

Identifiers.Name: HideFog
Identifiers.Description:
Set the visibility of fog.
Args:
bool Hide: Whether or not to hide the fog. Pass true to hide it and false to make it visible.

Returns: void

Identifiers.Name: ToggleFog
Identifiers.Description: Toggles the visibility of fog. No args, returns void.

Identifiers.Name: ToggleHud
Identifiers.Description: Toggles the visibility of the hud. No args, returns void.
